de.fu.weave
Class TemplateManager

java.lang.Object
  de.fu.weave.TemplateManager

public class TemplateManager
extends java.lang.Object

Loads and caches XSL-Templates

The idea is, that a TemplateManager should load and precompile Templates but keep them using WeakReferences. This is accomplished by using a WeakHashMap. Templates are loaded via loadTemplate(String) and retrieved via getTemplate(String).

Author:
Julian Fleischer

Method Detail

getBaseDir

public java.lang.String getBaseDir()
Retrieve this TemplateManagers base-directory

The base-directory is the place where to look up templates.

Returns:
The path of the base-directory

getTemplate

public javax.xml.transform.Transformer getTemplate(java.lang.String filename)
                                            throws TemplateManagerException
Retrieve a template by its name.

The template is first looked up by its name internally (typically they are cached). If it is not found (e.g. since the Garbage Collector removed it) it is loaded on the fly.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the template (typically a filename without path)
Returns:
An XSL-Transformer
Throws:
TemplateManagerException - If the template could not be loaded because it was either not valid or not found.

loadTemplate

public javax.xml.transform.Transformer loadTemplate(java.lang.String filename)
                                             throws TemplateManagerException
Loads a template into this TemplateManager

All templates are loaded with respect to the base-directory which can be set using setBaseDir. This will always load a Template, even if it is already loaded. If a template is already loaded and an attempt to load it again fails the old template will not have been discarded.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the template
Returns:
An XSL-Transformer
Throws:
TemplateManagerException - If the template to be loaded could not be found or contains errors

setBaseDir

public void setBaseDir(java.lang.String directory)
Set the base directory

The base directory is used to look up templates which not have been loaded already

Parameters:
directory - The path of the directory to be set
